name: Wait List - After School Program - J.P. Murphy
description: You are adding to the wait list only The After School program is currently full. You are adding to the wait list for the 2024-25 school year. If a spot opens up and we are able to offer you a spot, we will reach out. This afterschool program only pick up participants from West Portal. Our after school program is an experience that provides a safe and nurturing environment for youth in grades K-5 to develop life long recreation and leisure skills. howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
cost: The fee for the school year is $1,080. Parents will have the option to pay the entire fee upon registration. Payment plans are available. $270 is due upon registration and on the first day of October, January and March of the school year.
